Summary: Bright Light coming closer airplane that passed was much smaller suddenly dissapered
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Margaret
There were 2 other sightings in Margaret on or around March 3rd 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1. Standing on back porch smoking cigarette 2. bright light 3. bright object slowely asended and got brighter. The brightness was bluring looking at it. After asended it remained stationary and airplane looked to have pasted behid it and the plane was much smaller and had the distinct flashing lights. Did not notice any sound of a helicopter or anything else. The light looked to be a yellowish tint. It looks like the light ascended into no where. I video taped some with my I-phone and after reviewing the video the object appears white and solid and much smaller. 5.My feelings were it is a UFO. My wife started panicing thinking it was a comet or astroid falling to the surface. 6. Lost sight by the object dissapearing.
